SECURED DEBTS

Bank loans
245,200
During the year the company entered into a loan arrangement of £250,000 which is secured on the company's assets. The loan
has an initial 12 month interest free period where upon interest will be charged at 4.75% above base rate. The loan will be
repaid over a 5 year period after the initial interest free period.
